00020 class UStreamPlugIn;
00021 
00022 class U_EXPORT URingBuffer {
00023 public:
00024 
00025         // Check for memory error
00026         U_MEMORY_TEST
00027 
00028         // Allocator e Deallocator
00029         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00030         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00031 
00032         typedef struct rbuf_data {
00033                 fd_set readers; // bitmask
00034                 int pwrite, readd_cnt;
00035                 int pread[FD_SETSIZE];
00036         } rbuf_data;
00037 
00038         // Costruttori
00039 
00040         URingBuffer()
00041                 {
00042                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, URingBuffer, "", 0)
00043 
00044                 ptr = 0;
00045                 }
00046 
00047         ~URingBuffer();
00048 
00049         // SERVICES
00050 
00051         int  open();                            // Returns a read descriptor
00052         void init(int size);            // Initialize ring buffer
00053         void close(int readd);  // Close a read descriptor
00054 
00059         bool isEmpty(int readd)
00060                 {
00061                 U_TRACE(0, "URingBuffer::isEmpty(%d)", readd)
00062 
00063       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ptr)
00064 
00065                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("pwrite = %d pread[%d] = %d", ptr->pwrite, readd, ptr->pread[readd])
00066 
00067                 bool result = (ptr->pwrite == ptr->pread[readd]);
00068 
00069                 U_RETURN(result);
00070                 }
00071 
00083         int avail(int readd)
00084                 {
00085                 U_TRACE(0, "URingBuffer::avail(%d)", readd)
00086 
00087                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00088 
00089       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ptr)
00090                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_MINOR(readd, FD_SETSIZE)
00091                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(FD_ISSET(readd, &(ptr->readers)))
00092 
00093                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("pwrite = %d pread[%d] = %d", ptr->pwrite, readd, ptr->pread[readd])
00094 
00095                 int avail = ptr->pwrite - ptr->pread[readd];
00096 
00097                 if (avail < 0) avail += size;
00098 
00099                 U_RETURN(avail);
00100                 }
00101 
00113         int free()
00114                 {
00115                 U_TRACE(0, "URingBuffer::free()")
00116 
00117                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00118 
00119       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ptr)
00120 
00121                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("pwrite = %d", ptr->pwrite)
00122 
00123                 int _free = min_pread() - ptr->pwrite;
00124 
00125                 if (_free <= 0) _free += size;
00126 
00127                 U_RETURN(_free-1);
00128                 }
00129 
00136         int write(const char* buf, int len, bool pkt);
00137 
00138         int write(const UString& buf, bool pkt) { return write(buf.data(), buf.size(), pkt); }
00139 
00140         int readFromFdAndWrite(int fd);
00141 
00148         int read(int readd, char* buf, int len);
00149 
00150         int readAndWriteToFd(int readd, int fd);
00151 
00152         // STREAM
00153 
00154 #ifdef DEBUG
00155         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00156 #endif
00157 
00158 protected:
00159         char* ptrd;
00160         ULock lock;
00161         int size;
00162         rbuf_data* ptr;
00163 
00164 private:
00169         int min_pread() U_NO_EXPORT;
00170 
00175         void checkLocking() U_NO_EXPORT;
00176 
00177         URingBuffer(const URingBuffer&)            {}
00178         URingBuffer& operator=(const URingBuffer&) { return *this; }
00179 
00180         friend class UStreamPlugIn;
00181 };
